greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where T(n,k) = C(n*(n-1)/2-k*(k-1)/2+n-k+1,n-k).
comment: Remarkably, the following matrix products are all equal to A107876: A107862^-1*A107867 = A107867^-1*A107870 = A107870^-1*A107873.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jun 04 2005
